book.synopsis: Books 23-25 in the Left Behind: The Kids series are now available in a value-priced hardcover for collectors and readers who want a longer read. Best for ages 12 and up, but loved by all ages. Shaken includes volumes 23-25 from Left Behind: The Kids and background plots from Assassins and The Indwelling.
book.title_long: Shaken (Left Behind: The Young Trib Force)
book.dimensions: Height: 8.5 Inches, Length: 5.88 Inches, Weight: 1.2 Pounds, Width: 1.25 Inches
